# [Interview #1086: WoR Signing Report - Talenelat, Entry #24](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1086#24)

#### QUESTION

Any chance of a Shardspear?

#### BRANDON SANDERSON

Shardspear? YOU are going to get RAFO'd.
